category.name: ProductView
category.category_description: Preferences affecting the behavior of Product views

preference.name: Vis_PV_Geometry_Asset
preference.preference_description: Indicates whether a 3D Geometry Asset should be captured when a Product View is created. It also specifies if an Outline Capture should be included with the 3D Geometry Asset. Valid values are "NoGeoAsset", "GeoAssetWithOutline", "GeoAssetWithoutOutline".
